Overview

In this challenge, you must recover a kerbal in a command pod from a 27 by 37 kilometer orbit around Kerbin. The special thing about this orbit is that as soon as you load the craft, it will begin deorbiting due to atmospheric drag. Good luck.

This was originally created in the Kerbal Multiplayer Collaboration.

You can try this challenge on a separate **save file** here: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/pijwfch2lxuej2c/persistent.sfs?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pijwfch2lxuej2c/persistent.sfs?dl=0)

Rules

You can rescue What's-his-name in any way, but the winner is the user of the most impressive technique.

**A new craft must be launched and used.** No EVA bounce glitches or exploding the command pod to slow What's-his-name down!
